OnConnect.AddIRCMessage: !ANNOUNCEMENT! CHANNEL IS ACTIVE @channel
What have you sent me just now?
I am kinda busy here and it is dangerous to contact each other that frequently
It is him! Omicron
He wants to attack FBI server to wipe personal info
But he needs a crew, so he offered that job to the NightHawks
They need better tools, so they want to get to our PD Asset server!
It is protected with EnTech protocols, it should be safe
That .dll I dropped you? It is an EnSec breaker
You can make a valid .exe and breach through EnSec somehow
Our infrastructure is whitelisted as well, I don't see a direct threat
You sure it is Omicron who contacted you?
YES!
Analyze that .dll, it should contain some clues to find a place where Omicron can get a tool that allows to avoid whitelist
It is a contract that he tried to offer to NightHawks with my help
You refused? So there is no cover anymore?
Yes, I am on my own again, but I need to stop them before they figure out something else
I am disconnected from their chat
I don't know what Omicron is telling them, but they want to attack both of us, and Omicron is got info on YOU as well
I made a research
Maybe you were right...
Looks like he is back
What should we do? What do you see in that .dll?
It is...
A genius code...
It is definetly his work of art
I know that already, what else?
Hmm. Looks like it is a modified code from one of the EnTech servers, most probably EnSec and other protocls related
So the thing that can help NightHawks to avoid whitelist could be there?
Probably
But what is your angle? What exactly you want to do?
I need to wipe everything that in theory can give NightHawks and Omicron an access to Police servers
You want to raid EnTech? That's insane!
In my perspective, letting a neo-nazi hacker group to gain access to a hacker tools digital vault is more dangerous than violating a policy of an EnTech inc.
You have a .dll that can break EnSec, I just need a valid .exe and I won't endager you any longer
You want to raid them by yourself???
Clara, I've endangered you several times now. It is my justice manner, nobody else should suffer because of me
And you think I will let you go on a suicide mission when you have to fight against everyone?
Against a genius criminal mastermind?
Against a powerful hacker group that now hunts you?
Against a huge corporation and their security protocols?
On your own?
I've not made a decision about you yet, Captain
Never the less, I will support you on this one
Thank you Clara
Ok, I got the .exe that can help us, but I can't transfer it to you safely
SFCPD would notice
You can use exe trough me for now
I've created a file on this server's /bin folder, change IP to an actual address where EnSec is embedded and I will send you an admin pass
Just remember that this one works with new version of EnSec, older versions are not detected by .dll
Let's check this on Source of that .dll
If Omicron wants to find whitelist breaker, we should start our search from there
!ATTACHMENT:link#%#EnTech Side Server#%#27.113.216.249
Simply change IP text in INPUT.txt on this server to that address and it should work
